collection-member.title: It was a Dark and Stormy Night

body.p: This following is an XHTML table, inside a Table Wrapper %lt;table-wrap> wrapper, or prehaps a lettuce leaf, inside an enigma.

Multiple paragraphs are almost always a good idea to test
robustness, and
fortitude.
The last paragraph had a bulleted list embedded within it, imagine that! How clever of it.

caption.title: A Titled XHTML Table
caption.p: Additional caption ’material, which may spread to one or more paragraphs

statement.p: The IDREFs need to point to something
No Matter How Wise You Get, Wet Birds Don't Fly at Night

EM4 cells, stably transfected with Flag-HA-DAT, Myc-His-DAT, or both, were reacted with cross-linker and solubilized in Triton X-100 as above. There is no reason to have this formula, Q 10= ( M2 M1 ) 10/T 1- T2 here. Five microliters of anti-Myc 9E10 (Santa Cruz Biotechnology) was added to 0.2 ml of Triton X-100 extracts, and the mixture was incubated for 1 h at 4°C. Twenty microliters of rec-protein G Sepharose (Zymed) was added, and the mixture was incubated for 1 h at 4°C, washed three times in 0.5 ml of lysis buffer, and eluted in 45 μl of 2× Laemmli sample buffer without reducing agent.
